attributes.action: Bring in a law to stop Mum's from stopping fathers from seeing their kid(s).
attributes.background: Myself I am a young dad, My ex partner has stopped me from having contact with my young daughter, I've tried everything so my last resort it Legal action, I want to fight and fight but there is hardly any support for dad its all mum groups! Some young dads walk away but myself I couldn't do that!
